nodes.text: Big Rock Ranch was a destination on Coruscant's subtram in the Coruscant underworld.

The name was inserted onto the subtram map as an in-joke by the production team, along with the other destinations on the map, referencing the section of Skywalker Ranch, which acted as the main studio for Lucasfilm and its film releases. The name of Skywalker Ranch itself was given in the same episode.
